short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension to save links for later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you have a 100 tabs open of pages you want to use later; but you don't want to bookmark them, because well, bookmarks are too serious? Just pop it in 'Later'.

'Later' offers a clean, searchable table format, making it effortless to find and revisit your saved pages. Designed with simplicity and efficiency in mind, this extension is perfect for those who want a lightweight tool to remember interesting articles, handy resources, or just something to read 'Later'. Install now and transform your browsing experience with this elegantly straightforward tool. Let 'Later' take the load off your memory, so you can focus on what's important now.
